SEARCH
Package org.project.ClientPack

Interface RMIClientInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RMIClient
public interface RMIClientInterface extends Remote
interface to be implemented by rmi client. here are the methods that the rmi server can call on the rmi client

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    isConnected()
    method called by the server to accept that the client is always connected.

    method invoked by the server to notify the client of a new chat message

  • Method Details

    • printMsgChat

      void printMsgChat(String nickname, String message) throws RemoteException
      method that shows the player a new message
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the author of the message
      message - message text
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyInitialGameView

      void notifyInitialGameView(String[][] board, List<Integer> pointStack, HashMap<String,String[][]> gridsView, HashMap<String,String[]> tilesView, HashMap<String,Integer> pGoalView, List<Integer> cGoalView) throws RemoteException
      method invoked by the server to send the initial view
      Parameters:
      board - represents the game board
      pointStack - represents scores for common goals
      gridsView - represents each player's grid
      tilesView - the chosen tiles are present in this list
      pGoalView - in this list there are the personal goals fished
      cGoalView - in this list there are the common goals fished
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyPick

      void notifyPick(String[][] board, String[] tilesView, String playername) throws RemoteException
      method invoked by the server after a successful pick
      Parameters:
      board - new game board
      tilesView - the chosen tiles are present in this list
      playername - player's username
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyTopUp

      void notifyTopUp(String[][] grid, String[] tilesView, String playername) throws RemoteException
      method invoked by the server after a successful topUp
      Parameters:
      grid - new player's grid
      tilesView - the chosen tiles are present in this list
      playername - player's username
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyScoreBoard

      void notifyScoreBoard(HashMap<String,Integer> score) throws RemoteException
      method invoked by the server to notify the client of each player's final score
      Parameters:
      score - final scores
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyPopUpView

      void notifyPopUpView(String text, int identifier) throws RemoteException
      method invoked to print errors or other warnings to the client
      Parameters:
      text - text
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyTurn

      void notifyTurn(String username, boolean move) throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • isConnected

      void isConnected() throws RemoteException
      method called by the server to accept that the client is always connected. When the exception returns it understands that the client has disconnected and therefore removes the player from the list of online players
      Throws:
      RemoteException - when something goes wrong with the connection

    • notifyChat

      void notifyChat(String playername, String text) throws RemoteException
      method invoked by the server to notify the client of a new chat message
      Parameters:
      playername - message author
      text - text of the message
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • notifyChat

      void notifyChat(String playername, String text, String receiver) throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException
